title: Kaijuu no Kodomo (Children of the Sea)
synopsis: One summer vacation, Ruka meets two boys, "Umi" and "Sora," whose upbringing contains strange and wonderful secrets. Drawn to their beautiful swimming, almost more like flying, Ruka and the adults who know them are intertwined in a complex mesh...
staff: [['Tanaka, Eiko', ['Producer']], ['Watanabe, Ayumu', ['Director']], ['Kasamatsu, Kouji', ['Sound Director']], ['Yonezu, Kenshi', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
